official_title: A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1979 and 1980.

summary.text: Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to authorize appropriations in such amounts as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of such Act for fiscal years 1979 and 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1979 and 1980.
